of the Exchange Act. ☐                        
                            
  Item 8.01  Other Events.  
                            
On September 19, 2024, U.S. Bancorp (the      
“Company”) agreed to issue $10,000,000 of its 
Senior Medium-Term Notes, Series CC Callable  
Fixed Rate Notes due September 20, 2029 (the  
“Notes due 2029”), pursuant to the Company’s  
medium-term note program pursuant to which the
Company may issue from time to time its       
Medium-Term Notes, Series CC (Senior) (the    
“Series CC Notes”), and Medium-Term Notes,    
Series DD (Subordinated) (the “Series DD      
Notes” and, together with the Series CC Notes,
the “Notes”). The offering of the Notes due   
2029 and the Notes has been registered under  
the Securities Act of 1933, as amended,       
pursuant to a registration statement on Form  
S-3(File No. 333-270467). Filed as Exhibit 5.1
to this Form 8-K is a legal opinion with      
respect to the issuance of the Notes due 2029 
as well as future issuances of the Notes.
